name: tailwind
description: 1. Using the Makefile          The application can be executed using the makefile rules, these have to done in the order given below.         1.1 Run "make venv"         1.2 Run make install         1.3 The venv has to be activated manually using ./venv/bin/activate         1.4 Run make run     2. Manually         The application depends on modules that need to be downloaded. This can be done using pip. The application uses Flask         2.1 After installing Flask, create a virtual environment using python3 -m venv venv         2.2 activate the virtual environment         2.3 The run the application using python server.py
